channel.title: ExpatsRadioOnline.com
channel.description: Sixty FREE podcast minutes jam packed full of fun, chat, entertainment and events along with all sorts of info for expats for the coming week peppered with great unsigned music. Kick back and enjoy!

image.description: Sixty FREE podcast minutes jam packed full of fun, chat, entertainment and events along with all sorts of info for expats for the coming week peppered with great unsigned music. Kick back and enjoy!

item.title: Currently recording our syndicated FM radio shows - hoping to bring back the free podcasts when things settle down a bit! Click below to play the most recent show...
item.dc:creator: With your hosts Joe Wakeford & Lobster
item.description:
As the title suggests, we're currently recording syndicated shows for FM stations in USA. As soon as these are complete and airing we will let you know where you can find them. Feel free to subscribe to our  iTunes link so you can find out when our next FREE podcast is online!

In the meantime welcome to this new episode of Joe's Happy Hour! Sixty minutes jam packed full of fun, chat, entertainment, events along with all sorts of info for expats around the world for the coming week ... peppered with great music! Listen to the familiar friendly voices of Joe Wakeford & Lobster to escape from real life for an hour.

  • Subscribe to our RSS Feed
  • Subscribe to us on iTunes
  • Add us to your Google homepage
  • Follow us on Twitter

item.title: Ten of the top unsigned music acts around, great tunes... enjoy!!
item.dc:creator: With your hosts Joe Wakeford & Lobster
item.description:
Welcome to this new episode from ExpatsRadioOnline.com! Forty minutes jam packed full of the latest top unsigned music! Escape from real life for a bit end enjoy. The show is a podcast... so you don't need to be anywhere at a certain point!

Songs this week:

  • Grayson - What Have I Become
  • Black Akres - New Year's Eve
  • Francoiz Breut - De fil en aiguille (ouvrages de dames)
  • Track 07 - Stephen Brandon
  • Wild Beasts - Woebegone Wanderers
  • Toycult - Face In My Mind
  • -123 Minutes - Home
  • Nicole Conte - Rituals
  • The Wavemen - Waiting at the edge
  • Nevermore - Airfare
item.itunes:author: With your hosts Joe Wakeford & Lobster
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to this new episode from ExpatsRadioOnline.com! Forty minutes jam packed full of the latest top unsigned music! Escape from real life for a bit end enjoy. The show is a podcast... so you don't need to be anywhere at a certain point!
item.itunes:summary:
Welcome to this new episode from ExpatsRadioOnline.com (http://www.expatsradioonline.com)! Forty minutes jam packed full of the latest top unsigned music! Escape from real life for a bit end enjoy. The show is a podcast... so you don't need to be anywhere at a certain point! Songs this week:
* Grayson - What Have I Become * Black Akres - New Year's Eve * Francoiz Breut - De fil en aiguille (ouvrages de dames) * Track 07 - Stephen Brandon * Wild Beasts - Woebegone Wanderers * Toycult - Face In My Mind * -123 Minutes - Home * Nicole Conte - Rituals * The Wavemen - Waiting at the edge * Nevermore - Airfare
